text: Anton "Bert" Hellinger (16 December 1925 - 19 September 2019)Bert Hellinger MUERE: Adiós al padre de las Constelaciones Familiares | La Verdad Noticias was a German psychotherapist. He worked with a therapeutic method best known as Family Constellations and Systemic Constellations. He was born in Leimen, Baden, Germany. In 1973, he left Germany for a second time and traveled to the United States to be trained for 9 months by Arthur Janov.Love's Own Truths: Bonding and Balancing in Close Relationships, Bert HellingerFamily Constellations: A Practical Guide to Uncovering the Origins of Family ==Works== * Hellinger, B.
